Legend (1320)The Moon

K1 Logistics

Champions

  • Overload (2)

    Fallen Captains.

  • Barrier (3)

    Barrier Servitors.

Burn

Void

Shields

  • Solar (many)

    Shanks have Solar shields.

  • Arc (few)

    Fallen Captains have Arc shields. There's one in the first area and a few in the boss area.

Modifiers

Hot Knife – Shanks now have Solar shields.

Notes

Servitor boss teleports twice at each 3rd of its health, starting from middle → left → right.
